casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

99-1405. Alrjub v. Wheeler.

Franklin App. No. 98AP-1171. Discretionary appeal allowed and cause held for the decision in 99-219, 99-222, 99-223 and 99-224, Karr v. Borchardt, Seneca App. Nos. 13-98-33, 13-98-36, 13-98-35 and 13-98-34; briefing schedule stayed.

Lundberg Stratton, J., dissents.
